HomePage.subtitle: CROUStillant allows you to consult the menus of CROUS restaurants in France and overseas.

presentation.title: Made by students, for students...
presentation.description: CROUStillant is a project that aims to provide information on the menus of university restaurants in France and overseas.

updates.title: Hot dishes, always.
updates.description: CROUStillant scans the entire menus of CROUS restaurants several times a day to provide you with always up-to-date and reliable information.

open-source.title: Free & 100% open-source!
open-source.description: CROUStillant is an entirely open-source and free project. You can view the project's source code on GitHub and contribute to its development if you wish.

product.title: Simple, intuitive and accessible
product.description: CROUStillant is a simple and intuitive platform that allows you to access the menus of CROUS restaurants in France and overseas. The platform is accessible to all and does not require any registration.

features.feature2: Search by region, city or establishment

team.title: The team
team.description: The CROUStillant team is made up of passionate volunteers. We work together to make the information of CROUS restaurants more accessible and readable.

discord.title: Join our Discord server!
discord.description: Join our Discord server to chat with other users and the CROUStillant team!

integrated.title: Integrate CROUS data
integrated.description: You can integrate CROUS data directly into your own projects using our API. The API is free and open-source.

convinced.title: Convinced?
convinced.description: Discover the menus of CROUS restaurants in France and overseas with CROUStillant!

more-convinced.title: Even more convinced?
more-convinced.description: Join our Discord server to chat with other users and the CROUStillant team!

Footer.authors: Made with ❤️ by the CROUStillant Développement team.
Footer.legal: CROUStillant is not affiliated with the "CROUS". CROUStillant is a non-profit project.
